review_blob: A very nice beer, given its unpretentious price and aspect of the bottle. I would say its a hidden treasure. Discreet flavor, long, deep after-taste. An almost creamy feeling. In fact, its treasures are revealed only in time. I am so proud to have found this beer!

It is definitely a high-class beer. Yet one with an unstable personality. Strong flavor, very smooth palate, complex, fruity taste. Perhaps a bit too much carbonation, which tends to "lift" to taste to a sharp note. A beer you cannot ignore, nor forget.
A very interesting beer. It almost seems to have a personality: strong, seemingly bitter, yet seductive and elusive. The finish is long, creamy, tantalizingly fruity. A fine Belgian beauty.
Good, classy aroma. A nice, golden appearance, though I had expected a more durable foam. It does a vague suggestion of mysterious flavors. Overall, a decent Bavarian "helles" beer.
